documentation:
CreatePrtgDeviceEntidad: Represents the entity for creating a PRTG device. Contains optional IdPrtg, IdOb, Device, Host, and Tags properties.
ReadPrtgDeviceEntidad: Represents the entity for reading a PRTG device. Contains optional IdPrtg, IdOb, Device, Host, and Tags properties.
UpdatePrtgDeviceEntidad: Represents the entity for updating a PRTG device. Contains optional IdPrtg, IdOb, Device, Host, and Tags properties.
DeletePrtgDeviceEntidad: Represents the entity for deleting a PRTG device. Contains optional IdPrtg and IdOb properties.

code:
USE [catalogos]

-- =============================================
-- Author:		CHAT GTP
-- Create date: 2024-08-18 00:16:55.415680
-- Description:	Obtiene todos los dispositivos
-- =============================================
CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[prtgDevices_GetAll]
    @fechaInicio DATETIME = NULL,
    @fechaFin DATETIME = NULL
AS
BEGIN
    SELECT [idOb], [device], [host], [tags]
    FROM [dbo].[prtgDevices]
    WHERE (@fechaInicio IS NULL OR [fecha] >= @fechaInicio) 
      AND (@fechaFin IS NULL OR [fecha] <= @fechaFin)
END

-- =============================================
-- Author:		CHAT GTP
-- Create date: 2024-08-18 00:16:55.415680
-- Description:	Obtiene un dispositivo por su ID
-- =============================================
CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[prtgDevices_GetById]
    @idOb INT
AS
BEGIN
    SELECT [idOb], [device], [host], [tags]
    FROM [dbo].[prtgDevices]
    WHERE [idOb] = @idOb
END

-- =============================================
-- Author:		CHAT GTP
-- Create date: 2024-08-18 00:16:55.415680
-- Description:	Agrega un nuevo dispositivo
-- =============================================
CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[prtgDevices_Add]
    @device VARCHAR(50),
    @host VARCHAR(50),
    @tags VARCHAR(50)
AS
BEGIN
    INSERT INTO [dbo].[prtgDevices] ([device], [host], [tags])
    VALUES (@device, @host, @tags)
END

-- =============================================
-- Author:		CHAT GTP
-- Create date: 2024-08-18 00:16:55.415680
-- Description:	Elimina un dispositivo por su ID
-- =============================================
CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[prtgDevices_Delete]
    @idOb INT
AS
BEGIN
    DELETE FROM [dbo].[prtgDevices]
    WHERE [idOb] = @idOb
END

-- =============================================
-- Author:		CHAT GTP
-- Create date: 2024-08-18 00:16:55.415680
-- Description:	Actualiza un dispositivo por su ID
-- =============================================
CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[prtgDevices_Update]
    @idOb INT,
    @device VARCHAR(50),
    @host VARCHAR(50),
    @tags VARCHAR(50)
AS
BEGIN
    UPDATE [dbo].[prtgDevices]
    SET [device] = @device,
        [host] = @host,
        [tags] = @tags
    WHERE [idOb] = @idOb
END
documentation:
prtgDevices_GetAll : Obtiene todos los dispositivos
prtgDevices_GetById : Obtiene un dispositivo por su ID
prtgDevices_Add : Agrega un nuevo dispositivo
prtgDevices_Delete : Elimina un dispositivo por su ID
prtgDevices_Update : Actualiza un dispositivo por su ID
